skill.name: react-native-architecture
skill.description: Build production React Native apps with Expo, navigation, native modules, offline sync, and cross-platform patterns. Use when developing mobile apps, implementing native integrations, or architecting React Native projects.
skill.summary: Build production React Native apps with Expo, navigation, native modules, offline sync, and cross-pl...

security_audit.summary: The skill contains documentation and code examples only. No data access, network calls, or execution logic is present.

content.value_statement: Complex React Native apps can become slow and hard to scale. This skill provides proven Expo architecture patterns and examples.
actual_capabilities: Outline authentication flow with route protection
Describe offline-first setup with React Query
Show native module integrations for haptics and biometrics
Recommend performance optimizations for lists and rendering
limitations: Does not run commands or modify project files
Does not provide app specific API schemas
Does not manage store credentials or secrets
Does not diagnose device specific bugs

use_cases.title: Define app structure
use_cases.description: Design a scalable folder layout and routing strategy for a new React Native app.

use_cases.title: Add offline sync
use_cases.description: Plan React Query persistence and optimistic updates for offline usage.

use_cases.title: Improve performance
use_cases.description: Select list and rendering optimizations for large datasets.

prompt_templates.title: Start a new app
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a recommended React Native project structure and navigation plan for an Expo app with tabs and auth.

best_practices: Use Expo for faster iteration and managed updates
Memoize list items and use FlashList for large data
Test on real devices to catch platform differences

faq.question: Is this compatible with Expo and bare React Native?
faq.answer: Yes, it covers Expo first and notes where bare React Native differs.

faq.question: What are the limits of the guidance?
faq.answer: It provides architecture patterns and examples, not full app implementations.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing app structures?
faq.answer: Yes, the patterns can be adapted to existing folder and routing setups.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it is documentation only and does not access files or networks.

faq.question: What if examples do not fit my app?
faq.answer: Share constraints and it can tailor the architecture choices and tradeoffs.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic React Native tips?
faq.answer: It focuses on production architecture with Expo Router, offline sync, and native modules.
